Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Auberge Cavalière du Pont Des Bannes in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, you'll be by the sea and minutes from Parc Ornithologique de Pont de Gau and Church of Saintes-Maries. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Museum Baroncelli and Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer Arena.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 69 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with bathtubs are provided.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a spa tub, a sauna, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Auberge Cavalière du Pont Des Bannes. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer? This hotel features 4896 square feet (455 square meters) of event facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.
